attributes.action: Provide free energy to every citizen of the UK sufficient to provide at least one warm room
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Every winter around 25000 elderly people die as a direct result of lack of heat in their homes.Many other people find it difficult to heat their homes in winter. I believe there is an easy and cost effective solution to this problem - provide free energy sufficient to heat at least one room to every citizen of the UK. This scheme could be operated by the UK energy providers with very low additional cost by using tiered energy charges - first band free.
